bibl.title: The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2
bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Includes papers presented at the conference "Sappho in the Third Millennium" organised by A.B. at the university of Basel (summer 2014) or at the panel "New Fragments of Sappho" organised by A.L. at the annual meeting of the Society for Classical Studies (New Orleans, January 2015). - Pp. ix: Preface (A.B. & A.L.); - 1-9: Introduction (A.B. & A.L.). - Part 1: Sappho in the new fragments (6 contributions). - Part 2: Brothers Song (8 contributions). - Part 3: Kypris Song (4 contributions). - Part 4: Hera Song (fr. 17) (3 contributions). - Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: Anton Bierl & André Lardinois (edd.), The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2 = Mnemosyne. Supplements. 392.
Leiden - Boston, E.J. Brill, 2016, 8°, xvi-543 pp., 5 figg. ISBN 978-90-04-31162-6. €172.

P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Includes papers presented at the conference "Sappho in the Third Millennium" organised by A.B. at the university of Basel (summer 2014) or at the panel "New Fragments of Sappho" organised by A.L. at the annual meeting of the Society for Classical Studies (New Orleans, January 2015). - Pp. ix: Preface (A.B. & A.L.); - 1-9: Introduction (A.B. & A.L.). - Part 1: Sappho in the new fragments (6 contributions). - Part 2: Brothers Song (8 contributions). - Part 3: Kypris Song (4 contributions). - Part 4: Hera Song (fr. 17) (3 contributions). - Bibliography. Index.
